thread.title: RichWomenDating.net Introduces A New And Exciting Feature Called Lets Meet.
thread.title_full: RichWomenDating.net Introduces A New And Exciting Feature Called Lets Meet. - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: RichWomenDating.net Introduces A New And Exciting Feature Called Lets Meet.
text:
Online dating for rich women just got a little bit more creative and streamlined with the introduction of a cool new dating tool.
(PRWEB) September 14, 2015
Various dating platforms try to enhance the experience for users by utilizing different tools and features to simplify the process while keeping things fun and interesting. RichWomenDating.net is one such platform with their newly activated “Let’s Meet” feature. Launched in 2012, RichWomenDating.net is one of the leading millionaire dating sites available today
“We’re excited about this new feature on our dating platform”, said Mr. T, a representative of RichWomenDating.net. He went on to explain that, “the Let’s Meet feature is available to premium members and makes it very easy to scroll through and speak with other singles on the site. Users would be shown pictures of other members and they can determine whether or not they're interested in meeting. Meeting with another member is as simple as browsing through pictures and clicking “yes,” “no,” or “maybe” next to their pics.”
This new feature certainly allows premium members of this dating website to categorize potential matches in a fun way. It also allows for effortless scheduling of face-to-face meetings right from the website. As expected, members are already utilizing this exciting new feature.
About RichWomenDating.net
RichWomenDating.net is a new and absolutely results-producing online dating platform that connects rich women with compatible male counterparts. This website is packed full of exciting features such as dating tips, a very active blog, and so much more!
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12957722.htm
